explanation: The bug was using int(A/B) when A is exactly divisible by B. int(A/B) first performs floating-point division and then converts to int, which can lose precision for very large integers (or be slightly off due to floating-point rounding). The correct approach is to use integer division A//B which yields the exact integer result without converting through float. I fixed that single line by replacing print(int(A/B)) with print(A//B).
